text: ecurrent respiratory infections - Scoliosis - Selective tooth agenesis - Slender long bone - Small for gestational age - Sparse eyebrow - Sparse eyelashes - Sparse hair - Spina bifida - Sporadic - Telangiectasia - Thin calvarium - Thin ribs - Thin vermilion border - Underdeveloped nasal alae - Wormian bones - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease data
